title: Anyone remember the Illustrator tapered curves/swashes tutorial?
content: I am trying to locate a good Illustrator tutorial on drawing tapered curves and swashes that someone mentioned a few months ago. This was the one that explained how to get really gorgeous and complicated tapers, not just generating generic ornaments with brushes. Searching is not bringing up the post, does anyone remember it?
author: Dunwich Type
